name: Kreatika
description: Sample brand guideline structure focusing on early logo exploration directions for Kreatika.

identity.essence: Creative craftsmanship inspired by textile-making—built detail-by-detail, thread-by-thread.

concepts.name: Thread Mark
concepts.description: Flowing strokes evoke textile threads, connecting the K letterform with the brand's “Thread by Thread” essence. Rounded terminals suggest creativity and craftsmanship.

concepts.name: Artisan Mark
concepts.description: Clean geometric K paired with a plus-symbol accent, representing the addition of creativity to everyday items. A broken baseline hints at breaking creative boundaries.

concepts.name: Woven Mark
concepts.description: Interlaced strokes create a weaving pattern to directly reference textile craft. A layered effect adds depth while maintaining premium simplicity.

concepts.name: ASCEND
concepts.description: Three perfect triangles ascending—representing growth, ambition, and the journey from idea to masterpiece. The K is abstracted into upward momentum with mathematically precise geometry.
concepts.geometry: Equilateral triangles · 60° angles · perfect vertical symmetry
